attributes.action: destroy herion poppy fields in afganistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Muggings, Burglary, Robbery, killings, violent crime, organised crime, money laundering, and much more misery is caused by drugs so Get the armed forces to wipe out the poppy fields in afganistan and stop the biggest supply route of heroin to britain.
